title: TacoBond
author: TacoBond
content: Here is a new DEX that has caught my interest lately. This is quoted from their page    "zkSwap Finance is the top DEX and the first Swap to Earn DeFi Platform on zkSync Era ecosystem, pioneering a unique incentive model that rewards both liquidity providers and traders." Seems to operate very smooth with extremely low fees.  What do you guys think? Here is a link to their page.   https://docs.zkswap.finance/

comments.author: TacoBond
comments.body: They reached their goal of 10 million market cap and are now going to list on a central exchange. Another first is gas fees can be paid now with ZF instead of Ethereum.

comments.author: TacoBond
comments.body: Zkswap finance now listed on Gate io paired with usdt.  https://www.gate.io/price/zkswap-finance-zf

comments.author: TacoBond
comments.body: Zkswap Finance is now supported by ledger wallet

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.body: Quote from: TacoBond on December 01, 2023, 06:48:17 PMHere is a new DEX that has caught my interest lately. This is quoted from their page    "zkSwap Finance is the top DEX and the first Swap to Earn DeFi Platform on zkSync Era ecosystem, pioneering a unique incentive model that rewards both liquidity providers and traders." Seems to operate very smooth with extremely low fees.  What do you guys think? Here is a link to their page.   https://docs.zkswap.finance/I had received ZKF coins as airdrop sometimes ago, and I am glad to see that this project is progressing and adding new features to its network. I didn't sell tokens and had decided to put them on staking to receive regular staking rewards along with potential  capital gains. Recently they have recently announced their third launch pool project Merlin-chain, which is an interesting project and operates on Bitcoin network.https://twitter.com/BitalkGlobal/status/1759053759316160910

comments.author: TacoBond
comments.body: Zkswap now listed on Gate IO and MexC exchanges.

comments.author: TacoBond
comments.body: This is a first for a DEX. If you have a min of 100k ZF staked you no longer have to pay gas fees when swapping coins on their DEX.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: TacoBond on April 07, 2024, 03:00:24 AMThis is a first for a DEX. If you have a min of 100k ZF staked you no longer have to pay gas fees when swapping coins on their DEX.Can you give specific methodologies on how is this possible? The DEX doesn’t have any control to the transaction fee for the network except for those extra they are charging on every trade since DEX transactions is on chain unless your DEX is CEX then this is possible.I’m interested to know how can you cover the transaction fee using the ETH for the Zksync network? Will you refund the gas fee to the users wallet address once they initiate the trade?

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: TacoBond on December 01, 2023, 06:48:17 PMHere is a new DEX that has caught my interest lately. This is quoted from their page    "zkSwap Finance is the top DEX and the first Swap to Earn DeFi Platform on zkSync Era ecosystem, pioneering a unique incentive model that rewards both liquidity providers and traders." Seems to operate very smooth with extremely low fees.  What do you guys think? Here is a link to their page.   https://docs.zkswap.finance/Ive used this platform before and got some airdrops they have indeed a good dapp for zksync eco. I only received few but this is a good product, I wished I had focus on this one and allocate more funds before but its fine profit is profit. With their paymaster options which likely boost their token worth probably one of the best alpha on zksynv eco.
